addressFamily.description: The address family for the BGP peer. `ipv4 ` or `ipv6`.

amazonAddress.description:
The IPv4 CIDR address to use to send traffic to Amazon.
Required for IPv4 BGP peers on public virtual interfaces.

awsDevice.description: The Direct Connect endpoint on which the BGP peer terminates.

bgpAsn.description: The autonomous system (AS) number for Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) configuration.

bgpAuthKey.description: The authentication key for BGP configuration.

bgpPeerId.description: The ID of the BGP peer.

bgpStatus.description: The Up/Down state of the BGP peer.

customerAddress.description:
The IPv4 CIDR destination address to which Amazon should send traffic.
Required for IPv4 BGP peers on public virtual interfaces.

virtualInterfaceId.description: The ID of the Direct Connect virtual interface on which to create the BGP peer.
